page.title: 07VISIT TO PYLEIGH FARM (CONT)
page.content:
"The Ancient Wall and Gateway"
One interesting feature of the farm is an "ancient" wall and gateway near the entrance to the farm. Mr Day showed the gateway to the teachers and children and asked them how old they thought it was. The gateway was covered in ivy and moss and looked at least 400 years old. The History teacher with the group looked at the stonework and said "This must date back to Tudor times". Mr Day smiled. "Nearly right," he said."That wall and gate were built in 1953. Some farm workers who had just been made redundant put it up to earn a bit of extra cash. Nevertheless it's been listed as an ancient building."
